EmailTemplate.name: No Due Clearance Email
EmailTemplate.subject: NDC | {!Booking__c.Primary_Applicant_Name_Formulla__c}_{!Booking__c.Unit_Number__c} | {!Booking__c.Project_Name_Formulla__c}
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear {!Booking__c.OwnerFullName}
This is to inform you that no due clearance has been approved for Unit: {!Booking__c.Unit_Number__c}, Project: {!Booking__c.Project_Name_Formulla__c}.
We request you to please generate the possession letter.
Regards, Dynamix FI team
